overview: Ivory Blake (Christy Canyon) plays a mystery novelist whose Aunt has left her an inheritance. As a catch, she must use her "talent and skills" to locate mystery envelopes containing clues needed to attain the inheritance. These clues lead the sensual Ivory through a maze of erotic encounters.
tagline: Overspilling With A Bounty Of Erotic Delights...
title: Treasure Chest
